page.title: 09Entertainment
page.content: There are no real facilities for entertainment outside the home in the block. There are a wide range of sporting, social and recreational facilities in nearby Inverurie which are used by people in the block. There is still an opportunity for local people to make their own entertainment by joining Inverurie based clubs such as the Garioch Musical Society which exists to produce operetta and stage shows once a year. There are good sporting facilities in Inverurie such as the excellent Squash Club and the Social and Sporting Club based on the local football team, Inveruie Loco Works, a relic from the days when Inveruie had a large loco repair works.
